name: Vegard Gjertsen Gonsholt
bio: I'm an engaged third year computer science student with a strong passion for learning new technologies and contributing to collaborative projects. I enjoy solving problems in a structured and efficient way and thrive both independently and in team settings.

relevant_experience_history.experiences: Provide academic support to computer science students at UiB through the oracle arrangement. Focus on making topics understandable and strengthening student learning. Contribute to an accessible and welcoming learning environment.
Represented echo in the finals against other student unions. Solved programming problems under time pressure. Presented solutions to industry professionals.

relevant_experience_history.company: His Majesty The King’s Guard, Oslo
relevant_experience_history.experiences: Completed compulsory military service with high standards of discipline and teamwork.
Customer service and teamwork in a fast-paced environment

other.description: Support the leader in organizational decisions. Plan and coordinate sports events and social activities.
Plan, market, and organize company presentations and workshops. Advise companies on how to effectively reach out to computer science students.
